scripts.benchmark: node ./trainer/scripts/main.js --image-source ./test/images --recursive true --save false --preview false --compare true --models all
scripts.preview: node ./trainer/scripts/main.js --image-source ./trainer/image-source/CAT2000/Action --recursive true --save false --preview true --previewTimeout 5000 --compare true --models all --width 300 --height 300 --random false
scripts.export: node ./trainer/scripts/main.js --image-source ./trainer/image-source --recursive true --save true --preview false --compare true --models all
